text: JC (Cambodia) International Airlines Co., Ltd. () is an airline based at Phnom Penh International Airport in Cambodia. Founded in 2014, the airline launched operations in March 2017. JC (Cambodia) International Airlines is one of Cambodia's premier leading airline companies. It was founded in Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia with registered capital of 50 million US dollars. The total investment will be 1 billion US dollars. JC (Cambodia) International Airlines received Initial Principal Approval from the Royal Government of Cambodia dated 14 October 2014. On 17 March 2017, JC launched its inaugural service. ==Destinations== JC International Airlines serves the following destinations: {| class="sortable wikitable " |- ! Country/territory !
